path.style: stroke-width: 10; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: rgb(34, 34, 34); fill: rgb(34, 34, 34);
stroke-width: 40; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: rgb(255, 152, 0); fill: none;
stroke-width: 10; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: rgb(238, 238, 238); fill: none;
